opening the gate behind your subject,

or making sure there are
some windows there.

If that is no option just put your
lights into the frame at full power

It's even okay to have your

corporate video things.

Inside After Effects
open the tracker,

And with your clip selected

Now wait until the software

box right here.

Drag and move your composition
